answers.answer: This is NOT for "professionals" only people who post in here and may have come across the information I seek. Thanks.

question: How high does blood glucose need to be to cause diabetic coma?  If someone goes on vacation and eats and drinks whatever they like and come back to have glucose reading at over 700, just how bad is that.  Three days later it slowly returned to 130.  I think this may finally shock him into the reality and acceptance of diabetes.  He has been doing real good to keep from using insulin, he is only on metformin twice a day.  What is the highest blood sugar reading you can get? Thank you for any response.
title: Diabetic coma
